nodes.text: The Ubasameir were a sentient species with an inborn tenderness for younglings. A number of Ubasameir worked aboard the Kuari Princess, a giant luxury liner, during the Galactic Civil War. The Ubasameir worked in the Sub-Adult Center located on the Bazaar Deck. Parents were able to drop off their younglings to the center for educational and recreational care. The Ubasameirs aboard the Kuari Princess worked alongside a team of droids. They were present on the cruise ship when it was attacked by pirates when passing through the Maelstrom.
The Ubasameir were created by Ray Winninger for the roleplaying game adventure Riders of the Maelstrom, published by West End Games in 1989.
